name: Hubble
description: Hubble Protocol is an innovative DeFi protocol built on Solana. Users can deposit multiple assets to mint USDH at 90.9% LTV, yield positive interest on collateral deposits (earn while you borrow),provide liquidity in the Stability Pool, keep the system healthy by participating in our in-house liquidations, and on top of that users can hold and stake HBB, the protocol's native token. With HBB, users can: - Earn USDH rewards - Participate in the project's governance (coming soon)
